Our Races

Hearts and Soles

Heart & Soles is a Valentine’s Day themed 5k, 10k, and kids run. Every year, Cal Poly Triathlon partners with United Way of SLO County to help support local nonprofits in our community. On race day, there will be an expo with food, games and contests for the participants, in addition to booths set up by our sponsors. Grab a friend, your best Valentine’s costume, and join us for a beautiful race day!

Visit Site

March Triathlon Series

Visit Site

Tour De Donut

Prepare your stomach for the sweetest race of the year: the Tour de Donut. Eat as many donuts as you can and use your sugar-rush as fuel as you race to the top of Prefumo Canyon.
Victory has never tasted so sweet...

The official online home for the California Polytechnic State University (SLO) Triathlon Team. We are a club sports team that aims to make tri fun and accessible for students with all levels of ability and commitment.
